value.description: A wooden barrel. You can store drinkable liquids here. You better not dare mixing different liquids here. Doing so will increase the storing time an inmense amount because it would require to make chambers inside to keep the liquids separate. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of wooden barrels. You can store a variety of drinkable liquids in these. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A wooden basket for storage. You can store apparel here. Items stored here can still deteriorate
Some bundles wraps for storage. You can store dry and light loose items here. Too much variety will increase the time it takes to use this storage. Items stored here will not deteriorate
A pile of bundles wraps for storage. You can store dry and light loose items here. Items stored here will not deteriorate
A mass of big bundles wraps for storage. You can store dry and light loose items here. This building is slow to use given how bulky these wraps are. Items stored here will not deteriorate
A sturdy metal crate for securely storing many things. It is slow to use, but harder to break. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A small pile of sturdy metal crates for securely storing many things. It is slow to use, but harder to break. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A big pile of sturdy metal crates for securely storing many things. It is slow to use, but harder to break. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A very big pile of sturdy metal crates for securely storing many things. It is slow to use, but harder to break. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A wooden crate for storing general items. It is slower to use than shelves. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A small pile of wooden crates for storing general items. It is slower to use than shelves. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A pile of wooden crates for storing general items. It is slower to use than shelves. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large pile of wooden crates for storing general items. It is slower to use than shelves. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A tall wooden crate for storing general items. It is slower to use than shelves. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large wooden crate for storing general items. It is slower to use than other crates. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A very large wooden crate for storing general items. It is even slower to use than other slow crates. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_Two" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_Three" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_four" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_B" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_C"]

/Defs/ThingDef[defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_Two" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_Three" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_four" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_B" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_C" or defName="JDS_Wooden_Crate_Large"]/building

value.description: A vending machine. Your pawns refuse to pay for using it, though. You can store a great variety of items here, so long they are small enough to fit. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
An advanced medicine storage. You can store medicine and drugs here. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
An strong safe. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A big metal shelf. It can store small items. Sadly, without cardboard boxes these shelves can only store so much before stuff falls off. Item stored here can deteriorate.
A big metal shelf with cardboard boxes. It can store small items. Item stored here can deteriorate.

A chemfuel storage tank. You can store chemicals here. You better not dare mixing different items here. Doing so will increase the storing time an inmense amount because it would require to make chambers inside to keep the items separate. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.

A chemfuel pump with an underground storage tank. It is very slow to build. You can store chemicals here. You better not dare mixing different items here. Doing so will increase the storing time an inmense amount because it would require to make chambers inside to keep the items separate. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A bigger flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless. It is faster to use with less variety.
A bunch of cans on top of a pallet. You can store chemicals and heavy loose items here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of wooden crates on top of a pallet. You can store general items here. It is slow to use. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of wooden crates and barrels on top of a pallet. You can store general items here. It is slow to use. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A bunch of tidy wooden crates on top of a pallet. You can store general items here. It is slightly faster to use than the other pallets on top of crates options. Items stored here won't deteriorate.

A small amount of wooden crates on top of a pallet. You can store general items here. It is slightly faster to use than the other pallets on top of crates options. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A small flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.
Two cans on top of a small flat pallet. You can store Chemicals and Heavy Loose items here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A single wooden crate on top of a pallet. You can store general items here. It is faster to use than just a crate on the floor. Items stored here won't deteriorate.

A very big industrial shelf, the kind that only can be used with big machinery. You can store a very big amount of heavy items here, but it will be undoubtly be slow to use. Items stored here can deteriorate.

A very big industrial shelf, the kind that only can be used with big machinery. This one has boxes on it, allowing you to store any item. But it will be undoubtly be slow to use. Items stored here will not deteriorate.

An industrial size dumpster. This one is dedicated for stone chucnks. While this is limiting, this means that this building with no suffer penalties from different types of items whatsoever. Overall this is a fast to use storage building.

An industrial size dumpster. This one is dedicated for slag chucnks. While this is limiting, this means that this building with no suffer penalties from different types of items whatsoever. Overall this is a fast to use storage building.

An industrial size dumpster. This building can store chunks and raw resources. It is recommended to keep variety low. A high variety will mean a long time tidying up the insides of the dumpster. Overall this is a fast to use storage building.

A big silo able to store very large quantities of vegetarian food. This silo has internal chambers to keep different items separate, so you can store a big variety here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A metal cargo container. You can store many items here and they won't deteriorate even if outside. This building is a bit slow to use, though. Passable. Cannot hold roof.
A metal locker unit. You can store apparel here. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A military grade crate for storing general items. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A pile of military grade crates for storing general items. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A long military grade crate for storing general items. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large military grade crate for storing general items. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A large vault capable of holding whatever you throw at it. It is extremely slow to use, but very sturdy.

A large chemfuel storage tank. You can store chemicals here. You better not dare mixing different items here. Doing so will increase the storing time an inmense amount because it would require to make chambers inside to keep the items separate. Items stored here will not deteriorate, even if outside.
A post box. Here you can store a variety of books, tomes and publications. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A metal ammo box. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
Three metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A wooden ammo crate. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A big pile of wooden ammo crates. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A metal ammo box. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
Three metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A wooden ammo crate. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A big pile of wooden ammo crates. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A metal ammo box. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
Three metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A pile of metal ammo boxes. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A wooden ammo crate. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.
A big pile of wooden ammo crates. You can store ammo here. Items stored here won't deteriorate.

nomatch.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="JDSAmmo_Crate" or defName="JDSAmmo_Crate_Piles" or defName="JDSAmmo_BoxA" or defName="JDSAmmo_BoxB" or defName="JDSAmmo_BoxC"]
